body:
Not sure if it is related but tools\run_tests\helper_scripts\run_node.bat  fails too with
```
Failure
Now using node v8.9.0 (npm v5.5.1)
+ CONFIG=dbg
++ dirname tools/run_tests/helper_scripts/run_node.sh
+ cd tools/run_tests/helper_scripts/../../..
++ pwd
+ root=/var/local/git/grpc
+ test_directory=src/node/test
+ timeout=8000
+ '[' dbg = gcov ']'
+ JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=src/node/report.xml
+ JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1
+ ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --timeout 8000 --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter src/node/test

  Async functionality
       should not hang: 17ms

  Suite duration: 0.023 s, Tests: 1
node: ../deps/uv/src/unix/core.c:250: uv__finish_close: Assertion `handle->flags & UV_CLOSING' failed.
tools/run_tests/helper_scripts/run_node.sh: line 48:  9950 Aborted                 (core dumped) JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=src/node/report.xml JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1 ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --timeout $timeout --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter $test_directory
```
